title: President grieved over death of Nazir Hussain Dhoki
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 14 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Sunday expressed his deep grief and sorrow over demise of Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Media Coordinator Nazir Hussain Dhoki.
The president prayed for the eternal peace of the departed soul and for the bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release.
President Zardari also paid tribute to services of late Dhoki for PPP.
